body_html:
It looks like you're using the distributed functionality properly. The first machine throws an error "Prefetching error std::bad_alloc" and terminates, which makes the second machine time out on trying to communicate with the first machine. I think the real problem here lies in prefetch_op.h, not ibverbs.

Can this error be reproduced consistently? If so, can you look at memory usage of both processes over time? The std::bad_alloc makes me think this can be out of memory related.
